wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Jane Lloyd (14 July 1928 – 20 October 1995) was a British artist and teacher. As an artist she worked in oils and watercolours, produced murals and also painted film sets.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Lloyd

response: Among Curtis Green's grandchildren were the architect Jeremy Sampson (Sam) Lloyd (1930–2009) and the artist and designer Elizabeth Jane Lloyd (1928–1995)."Obituary: Elizabeth Jane Lloyd", Independent, 13 October 1995, accessed 27 February 2020. Sam Lloyd carried on the Lloyd Green and Adams business after the retirement of his father, Antony, in 1970. Curtis Green's great-grandson, Michael, is a furniture restorer, currently based in Battersea, South West London.About Curtis Green, Curtis Green Furniture. Retrieved 25 March 2021.

response: *Elizabeth Jane Lloyd, 67, British artist and teacher.
In 1952 Hoare married Elizabeth Jane Lloyd, a fellow artist he met when they both studied at Chelsea School of Art. One daughter is also an artist, with whom he had a joint exhibition
